replies.body:
{{champion:126}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:107}} 

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
As LS said "Is this some kind of sick joke?"
Yay buffing Draven, thats exactly what we DIDN'T want to happen.
I feel you {{item:3070}}

I love how Riot always makes **absolutely** sure we know balancing is a difficult job, whilst completely ignore the community, which is the **first** place to look when you want to make balancing easier.

also, i have 5 unopened chests and 5 more to get with S's but in the span of 4 months i have only gotten 2 key fragments, pull your shit together. and make it look like you give a fuck.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Yeah takes bloody ages to get a key. I've got like 15 chests.
yea it dose

But the question is do you even play Kalista? If you do then i understand your feelings on the subject, but think about it if you don't play it. Also its Season 7 so all ADC's are as worthless as Mr Gear (don't know if anyone understands that joke). Basically what i'm saying is don't ask for buffs/nerfs on characters you don't play.

EDIT: Never mind that just realised you were making more of a statement to Riots mind behind character balancing and how fucking bullshit it is, like whoever is in lead should be fired and replaced with someone who actually plays the game.

I understand, Kalista is a good champion that has lots more potential. Riot keeps messing things up. the Jungle changes was what really made me re-consider my time on this game.I main jungle so that's why it upsets me. Riot don't even know how to balance campions, Look and Tryndamere he is just dumb late game he can 3 shot a tank. I still love League but until Riot fixes some of those mistakes I will give the game a rest.

Thanks,
BanterBants

okay id have to argue with what you would call balance champs...people who you think are unbalanced such as you said tryndamere, ive got near 2k games tryn and i can you this hes easily beaten providing you use a little research on how to beat him such as building ninja tabi's and armor...... there you go providing you didnt feed tryn early and thier isnt a massive gold disadvantage bam any tanky champ beats him easily that way..........
tryn is suppose to have a strong late game due his lack of early game strength makes sense yeah? you wont have champs such as darious who is a god of the top lane laning phase be as big of a threat late game when every1 is full build if you have noticed that in lower elos such as bronze silver and gold yeh people deem tryn as op like you becuase someone who can play tryn gets ahead and owns the game

Would you look at that, someone who plays a champion trying to argue they aren't OP.

Tryn fits the "noobish" category of champions, which includes Riven, Yi, Kat, Darius, Garen, etc.
Easy to use, and incredibly strong late game.
Press R and go ham.

okay, kat has become quite a hard champion to play and i respect those that play her well, i also respect good riven players. keyword GOOD. riven is only op when people who are good play her, problem is she still performs to a balanced level when people who are terrible play her.
heres an idea if hes so nooby then play him you might actaully rank up some more that elo of yours
I don't play ranked. The players in normal games are disgusting enough.

Hey Riot, genuinely wondering if we're going to get **item sets** back in the new client? 

I had **items sets** for my main champion pool, so when the season ticked over and a bunch of items were released and changed I had to switch back to the legacy client to fix my item sets or delete them in some cases which was _really_ quite the hassle.
I would love to hear more about this, whether you're on the fence about it, or a plain and simple yes or no.
Thank you!!!

(P.S. I really do want **item sets** back though, to be clear. _A lot._)

{{item:3107}} {{item:3814}}

So once more Riot releases skins for champs that have WAY TOO MANY SKINS! Can we get some skins for champs that don't have a lot like Syndra? She's got 4 skins and I wouldn't even consider the Queen of Diamonds Syndra skin a skin because it adds nothing except for a retexture.
Riot focuses on nerfing Shyvana and Lee Sin when Rengar is just one-shotting everyone.

I started playing in Season 4, and i can't tell you how much I miss those days.
Now Riot is just slowly killing the game, you don't want to listen to the community, that's fine. Very soon there will be no community at all to judge. It really seems like people who work at Riot do not actually play the game.
Season 4 is why I stayed to play the game. Because barely anyone raged in chat and everything wasn't balance according to LCS, also Riot released urf. :P
That Lucian buff is WEAK and nerfing shyv but leaving rengar untouched xd

Wow great job ruining the jungle. Not only are junglers unable to match level 6 with the laners, but you are LITERALLY encouraging lane taxing to keep up with XP, which puts the laners behind. Without taxing, junglers are about as behind as supports in late game.
I definitely rate this patch a 0/10
Where is heart seeker lucian??{{item:3070}}
Is it valentines day yet?

I have waited far too long for that Azir skin xD

just my luck that Azir gets a skin announced just before the longest break in patches in the year :P

I cant wait for it!
already buy gp's new skin in first sell day.{{champion:41}} {{item:3903}}
{{champion:64}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{item:3070}} ritoplz
When's sandbox mode coming out, looks real fun
when are they gonna update warwick ?
did you guys put the wrong youtube video on the main page?

I find it very hard to believe no ones found the bug with Draven's q yet. I'm not sure whether it's just Primetime Draven but occasionally his q plays the annoying sound effect from his Pool Party skin when it hits something.
because people haven't been bothered reporting it?
Never OP any more{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
